author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Barnwell Industries Posts Qtrly EPS Of $0.08
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Barnwell Industries Inc:
* BARNWELL INDUSTRIES, INC. REPORTS RESULTS FOR THE SECOND QUARTER AND SIX MONTHS ENDED MARCH 31, 2018
* BARNWELL INDUSTRIES INC QTRLY NET EARNINGS $0.08 PER SHARE
* BARNWELL INDUSTRIES INC QTRLY REVENUES ABOUT $2 MILLION VERSUS ABOUT $3 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
